source.name: Coal Production by MSHA ID, Mine Operation, and Union Status, 1997
source.description: Coal Production Data Files contain information which identify the mining operation (i.e., operation name, mailing address, telephone number, State and county of operation, etc.), annual coal production, and code definitions.
